name: Hatchblower Pepper IPA
description: This fresh and fruity IPA derives its name from the nickname of of astronaut Gus Grissom, who earned his wings at our home, Fort Ben. Piquant and delicious, this beer is flavored with green pepper, chipotles & jalapeños during the conditioning process. With subtle spice and sweetness, it is a delight for the taste buds!
